channel.description: Boot Process, GRUB2, and the Linux Kernel Linux boot process: firmware, bootloader, kernel, and initialization Understand and interact with GRUB2 to boot into different targets Modify GRUB2 configuration Boot system into specific targets Reset lost or forgotten root user password Linux kernel, packages, version anatomy, and key directories Download and install a newer kernel version RHCSA Objectives Interrupt the boot process in order to gain access to a system Modify the system bootloader Multiple phases during the boot process.
